markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healing Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=267) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 121 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

Your positive energy is even more vibrant and restorative. When you cast [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), you roll d10s instead of d8s.

<title level="2">Healing Hands leads to...</title>
[Magic Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=1700)
name: Healing Hands
